name: Clarence Linen Left-Arm Corner Sofa - Flax Beige
description: The Clarence has a pleasingly clean-lined, square appearance with a solid base, down-filled cushions, neutral flax-colored linen upholstery and matching throw pillows at the arms. There is a slight lean to the backrest which enables you to recline comfortably. This corner sofa is supported by eight-way hand-tied springs for flexibility and comfort, and though it appears to feature a fixed cover, it actually benefits from a slipcover which can be removed for ease of washing. When seated, a chaise extends out on your left, providing extra relaxation and room for more guests.
